The police Leah Sanders (Claudia Michelsen) never pursued anyone with as much obsession as the Bose Martin (Fritz Karl). She is convinced that he is the maniac who murdered several women, including his sister, and now managed to find him near a hut on top of a mountain alone. At the time, pointing his weapon at him, the door is open and the cabin is Jan Meinert (Herbert Knaup), a doctor who planned to spend a week there with the young romantic Sebacher Maria (Eva Herzig). But before that Jan can understand what is happening, one shot causes the flood. The huge mass of snow that falls on them imprisons four in the cabin. Handcuffed, Martin argues that Jan is the real killer and that until then had followed to prevent that killed another woman.
